title: Global Shopper: At Givenchy’s Men’s Shop in Paris, the Two Sides of Riccardo Tisci
text: BING NEWS: At Givenchy’s Men’s Shop in Paris, the Two Sides of Riccardo Tisci Thus, the Marais — Paris’s gay mecca ... stores catering to the stylish men who fill its streets. Along the Rue des Archives are men’s boutiques from Gucci, Fendi, Moncler and, at No. 13, Givenchy. Under Riccardo Tisci, its artistic director ... 08/6/2015 - 12:06 pm | View Link Eclectic international eats at Sugar Beets My first interaction with Martin Ledesma was by way of the food at his Camarillo restaurant, Chili Peppers. Last year, I wrote about their decadent Friday night dinners, when the restaurant showcases its fancy side in the form of gourmet dishes alongside ... 12/22/2010 - 11:00 am | View Link The hottest looks, the coolest accessories... We bring you the best of the new season fashion Riccardo Tisci did some stunners ... colours on the top and bottom sides of the lashes. These playful lashes appear black from the top yet reveal a vivid orange when peeked from below. Le soin noir is Givenchy's first haute couture cream.
